com.futurice.cascade.reactive.ui

Class ReactiveTextView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView
        • com.futurice.cascade.reactive.ui.ReactiveTextView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener, INamed

    public class ReactiveTextView
extends android.widget.TextView
implements INamed
    Change the displayed value from any thread by calling view.bindable.set(String value)

    Examples: 

    
     AtomicTextView view = new AtomicTextView(Activity.this);
 
    
     // Inject shared concurrent data from your model
     AtomicValue statusAtomicValue = new AtomicValue<>();
     AtomicTextView liveView = new AtomicTextView(Activity.this, statusAtomicValue);
     statusAtomicView.set("Something updated live to the screen");

      • onDetachedFromWindow

        public void onDetachedFromWindow()
        Description copied from class: android.view.View
        This is called when the view is detached from a window. At this point it no longer has a surface for drawing.
        Overrides:
        onDetachedFromWindow in class android.view.View
        See Also:
        View.onAttachedToWindow()

      • onAttachedToWindow

        public void onAttachedToWindow()
        Description copied from class: android.view.View
        This is called when the view is attached to a window. At this point it has a Surface and will start drawing. Note that this function is guaranteed to be called before View.onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas), however it may be called any time before the first onDraw -- including before or after View.onMeasure(int, int).
        Overrides:
        onAttachedToWindow in class android.widget.TextView
        See Also:
        View.onDetachedFromWindow()

      • setReactiveValue

        public void setReactiveValue(ReactiveValue<java.lang.String> reactiveValue,
                             boolean fire)
        Change the view model used to set the display
        Parameters:
        reactiveValue - the new view model
        fire - push the current value of the view model to the screen after this action completes on the UI thread
